transcription: Spectro Skincare. Your new routine starts today. Spectro doesn't tingle. Spectro doesn't foam. Spectro doesn't scrub or scrape. While these things may feel good, they can disrupt the skin's moisture barrier, which could make breakouts worse. Spectro is different. It gently removes dirt and oil.  while protecting your skin's natural moisture barrier. This means less drying, cracking, dirt, and bacteria. Getting your skin ready is as simple as Spectro. Spectro Skin Care, your new routine, starts today.  you
